aws rds describe-db-instances --db-instance-identifier sfly-aws-dwh-sandbox-poc-postgres --query "DBInstances[0].VpcSecurityGroups" --region us-east-1

aws ec2 describe-security-groups --group-ids sg-08e25756fabcaa300 --region us-east-1

aws ec2 describe-route-tables --filters "Name=association.subnet-id,Values=$(aws ec2 describe-subnets --filters "Name=tag:Name,Values=sfly-aws-dwh-sandbox-poc-public-1a" --query 'Subnets[0].SubnetId' --output text)"

aws ec2 describe-route-tables --filters "Name=association.subnet-id,Values=$(aws ec2 describe-subnets --filters "Name=tag:Name,Values=sfly-aws-dwh-sandbox-poc-public-1b" --query 'Subnets[0].SubnetId' --output text)"

aws ec2 describe-route-tables --filters "Name=association.subnet-id,Values=subnet-056d2f99d617b49ae,subnet-09c5c513610d30e0e" --region us-east-1

aws ec2 describe-network-acls --filters "Name=association.subnet-id,Values=subnet-056d2f99d617b49ae,subnet-09c5c513610d30e0e" --region us-east-1

aws rds describe-db-instances --db-instance-identifier sfly-aws-dwh-sandbox-poc-postgres --query "DBInstances[0].Endpoint" --region us-east-1

aws rds describe-db-instances --db-instance-identifier sfly-aws-dwh-sandbox-poc-postgres --query "DBInstances[0].PubliclyAccessible"  --region us-east-1

aws ec2 create-flow-logs --resource-type Subnet --resource-ids subnet-056d2f99d617b49ae,subnet-09c5c513610d30e0e --traffic-type ALL --log-group-name <log-group> --deliver-logs-permission-arn <iam-role-arn>
